text:
Probably can you achive it with some CSS, but without the form I can’t help you.

Here we’re using custom forms made by us and we only submit the values to HubSpot.

Okay, so you should definitely be able to change it in the CSS (technically also true for external pages w/HS forms but they have extra stuff that can make it more difficult), but Guido is right, anybody wanting to get more specific would have to take a look :slightly_smiling_face:
This might help, but I’d recommend talking with one of your FE developers so you don’t waste your time trying to find the right things to change: <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/HubSpot-form-markup>
`hs-input` might put you in the right ballpark, but it might not be enough to target that placeholder text :shrug:
